channel.title: Help with VPN over VPN using NordLynx
channel.description:
Hello, hoping someone here can help with configuration of VPN over VPN using NordLynx VPN service.
I am running v0.99.5 and have successfully configure the wireguard interface using NordLynx. The service connects and shows that is active under the wireguard tab.
What I am having trouble with is getting the router to send traffic through wireguard, instead it goes directly through Speedify. I have tried it with and without the "extra step for v99.9" show here: https://smoothwan.com/vpn/

item.title: Help with VPN over VPN using NordLynx
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
Hi, what device and any custom setup?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with VPN over VPN using NordLynx

Hello, hoping someone here can help with configuration of VPN over VPN using NordLynx VPN service.

I am running v0.99.5 and have successfully configure the wireguard interface using NordLynx. The service connects and shows that is active under the wireguard tab.

What I am having trouble with is getting the router to send traffic through wireguard, instead it goes directly through Speedify. I have tried it with and without the “extra step for v99.9” show here: VPN over VPN - SmoothWAN
